name: Project Sandbox
description:
Project Sandbox is a game that I made for fun over the school holidays, inspired by various sandbox titles. You can create your own game, whilst playing it at the same time.

There are 2 world templates to pick from; Flatty World, and Base World.

  • Flatty World: The first level created, Flatty World is true to it's name; being very flat. This level is reccomended for people who are starting the game and want to mess around.
  • Base: Base world is the level to use to create your very own levels! Here, there is a single platform (Which you can delete). It's reccomended that you play Flatty World before playing this.
  • Sky: Sky is a level similar to Base World, except with a skybox. 

 Once loaded into one of these worlds, you can spawn various items and objects to start creating your own mini level.
